word.0: 失魂落魄 - shi hun luo po
word.1: 穷困潦倒 - qiong kun liao dao
word.2: 三思而行 - san si er xing

desc.0:
失魂 - lost the soul
落魄 - dejected and in poverty 
Used together to describe someone who has lost all will and motivation
desc.1: Describing a situation that hinders someone from attaining wealth / money
